value.name: Sunak Faces Electoral Tests That Risk Encouraging Tory Plotters
value.description: Still, much of the political focus will be on the Reform UK party and its ability to siphon off support from the Conservatives. That is the nightmare scenario for many Tory Members of Parliament, who fear a split in the right-wing vote will facilitate a ...

value.name: Sunak braced for double by-election test in Wellingborough and Kingswood
value.description: Rishi Sunak is braced for tests in Wellingborough and Kingswood, where Labour hopes to flip Tory majorities in the tens of thousands.

value.name: Minister recalls ‘sadness and shock’ over Nicola Sturgeon’s decision to quit
value.description: A year on, however, Scottish Conservatives claimed the former SNP leader is a “totally discredited politician” and that “her reputation and credibility lie in tatters”. Nicola Sturgeon is now a totally discredited politician. Her reputation and ...

value.name: Tories face election wipeout in Scotland, poll predicts
value.description: The Liberal Democrats would secure four seats but the Tories would return no MPs in Scotland for the first time since 1997. The polling of 18,000 people was carried out on behalf

value.name: Sunak braced for double by-election test in Wellingborough and Kingswood
value.description: Rishi Sunak is braced for tests in Wellingborough and Kingswood, where Labour hopes to flip Tory majorities in the tens of thousands.

value.name: Michael Matheson ‘missed dozens of NHS targets’ even before iPad scandal
value.description: Scottish Conservatives say former health secretary failed to tackle NHS problems and was then distracted by the row over £11,000 roaming charges

value.name: Minister recalls ‘sadness and shock’ over Nicola Sturgeon’s decision to quit
value.description: A year on, however, Scottish Conservatives claimed the former SNP leader is a “totally discredited politician” and that “her reputation and credibility lie in tatters”. Nicola Sturgeon is now a totally discredited politician. Her reputation and ...

value.name: Inflation figure gives Sunak hope for better economy in time for Autumn election
value.description: An expected uptick in inflation did not materialise and the rate of price growth is now expected to slow markedly

value.name: Tories target Labour with ‘Starmer Sutra’ Valentine’s attack ad
value.description: Mocking the Labour leader’s changing stances, the Conservatives' ad follows Labour's about-turn on its green investment plan

value.name: Tories face being reduced to 80 seats, poll of 18,000 voters suggests
value.description: Cabinet ministers are predicted to lose their seats in total in what would mark the worst Conservative wipeout in history

value.name: Analysis: Tough week tests Keir Starmer's leadership
value.description: That change means a key threat to the Conservatives, who know that controversies surrounding Labour's former leader Jeremy Corbyn played into Boris Johnson's landslide victory in the general election in 2019. That is why, politically, this week matters.
